data:
{
  "deviceIdentifier":"@deviceIdentifier",
  "apiSecret":"@apiSecret",
  "topic":"@topic",
  "message":"@progress.completion % complete - @message",
  "printSize": "@meta.analysis.dimensions.width mm wide x @meta.analysis.dimensions.depth mm deep x @meta.analysis.dimensions.height mm tall"
}
eventPrintFailedMessage: Something went wrong and your print has failed.
eventPrintPausedMessage: Your print has paused. You might need to change the filament color.
eventUserActionNeededMessage: User action needed. You might need to change the filament color.
_description: This template shows how to use dot notation to create custom messages and send custom data elements. See the DATA setting for details.
